author: kreczko
body:
Backport of PR #20227 (Jira ticket [CMSLITDPG-171](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSLITDPG-171)).

The main PR is not merged yet, this backport might receive code changes based on the review of the main PR.
title: [92X] Offline DQM extensions for L1T EGamma (calo layer 2) and fixes - backport
